name: grindingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that remains extremely difficult, unpleasant, or boring for a very long time: The rich elite is plundering a grindingly poor country. The first half of the match was grindingly dull. Related words
grind someone down
grinding poverty literary
grind noun (WORK) informal
extremely: They made the grindingly obvious point that this area is a part of London. Synonym
extremely
More examplesFewer examplesLife for all but the wealthy was grindingly hard.He works grindingly long hours.She attends grindingly boring meetings.The film is a hard watch, and in parts is grindingly dull. Progress remains grindingly slow.
